## mbt build branch

Build all modules at the tip of the specified branch

### Synopsis


Build all modules at the tip of the specified branch

Build all modules at the tip of the specified branch.
If branch name is not specified, the command assumes 'master'.



```
mbt build branch <branch> [flags]
```

